mission_vision: Cansel helps organizations in the engineering, surveying, construction, mining, architecture, manufacturing, printing, utilities, forestry, and government sectors measure, analyze, design, and build more efficiently and profitably. We have been providing tailored solutions to our clients for over 50 years.

products_services.main_offering: Distributor of land-based positioning systems in Canada
products_services.value_proposition: Through the consolidated strength of our businesses, Cansel provides individual project needs and addresses a larger solution for your entire organization. We offer solution-based packages to maximize technology investment and simplify project delivery.

product_fields.field: Geospatial High Accuracy Field Instruments and Product

company_culture.work_environment: Depends on the job (Working environment is not standardized across the company.)
valued_employee_qualities: Ability to learn and understand quickly new technologies

communication_style.preferred_tone: Formal but straight to the point (Corporate organization)

standard_benefits_perks: Uncapped Commission incentives for the sales team
Flexible extended health and dental benefits program
Group Life, Short-term Disability, Long-term Disability, AD&D, and Critical Illness Insurance
Access to Virtual Medical Care and Virtual Mental Health Services
Company vehicle program for Sales Reps
Preferred rates on some gym memberships
Access to Luxury Corporate vacation properties
